description_html:
The Sixpenny Swatchbox is the company's take on a "try before you buy," where customers can select any number of fabric, leather, or wood samples from the extensive collection , and Sixpenny will ship the swatches to the customer (to keep!) within a week.

Unlimited Fabric and Leather Swatches. For wood and mixed materials swatches, one each is free. Any additional are $5.00 Each.

The Sixpenny Swatchbox program has three steps.
1) Pick Samples: While browsing an item, customers can select any fabric, leather, or wood and add it to their cart.
2) Sit Back and Wait: Sixpenny will send the box of swatches with one week, free shipping.
3) That's it (Really!): The samples are the customers to keep and Sixpenny hopes that they inspire the customers next home purchase!
